description:
Thanks to information given to Gento by his friend Yoshiki, CRI finally learns the location of the laboratory of Dr. Ren, creator of all Humaritts. While the military launches an offensive strike, Najica and Lila are sent to infiltrate the lab and retrieve Dr. Ren. 
As Najica sets out on her latest adventure, Majima warns her that the most dangerous Humaritt on this mission may be her very own partner. Will Lila`s emotional bond with her master spell trouble for Najica?

titles.title: Die traurigste Mission betrifft das Herz des Mädchens
Mission d`adieu avec les compliments de la jeune fille
Sekibetsu no Mission o Shoujo no Magokoro to Tomo ni
The Sad Parting Mission with Girl`s Sincerity
惜別のミッションを少女のまごころと共に
